textBeforeTable: (GST and manual included) 12 hours/2 sessions or 12 hours/3 sessions Prerequisites: Basic computer skills or Computer Basics class This class may be offered live on your personal computer if you have a webcam with a microphone, high speed internet and Microsoft Word software. Call Rick Wagman at 306-775-7450 for more information. Course is intended for people new to Microsoft Word and is designed to help you obtain the basic skills required to create professional looking letters and memos. Learn to create, edit, format, print and review short documents. You will learn to apply basic page, paragraph and character formatting options, create a document from a template, insert pictures and clip art, create a simple table and merge a mailing list to produce labels. Hands-on exercises allow you to practice these skills. + Word Introduction (COAP 1618) CRN: 201503-740 Saskatoon $415.00 March 15, 2016 - March 16, 2016 Tue, Wed - 9:00 am-3:59 pm Room: B8.13 Registration deadline: March 12, 2016 Register Online CRN: 201502-719 Saskatoon $415.00 October 13, 2015 - October 14, 2015 Tue, Wed - 9:00 am-3:59 pm Room: B8.13 Registration deadline: October 9, 2015 Register Online CRN: 201504-66 Regina
